title: Audiences will increasingly direct news coverage — for better and for worse
description: The shattering of mass media into niche channels is nearly complete. For the first time in 2025, more people in the U.S. accessed news through social media text and videos than through TV or news websites, according to the Reuters Institute for the Study of Journalism.
